articles.author: Nick Rodriguez
articles.title: I Played Metroid Prime 4, and I'm Not Worried About Samus' 'Annoying' Sidekick - Game Rant
articles.description: There's been a lot of talk about Metroid Prime 4's human companions, but as someone who's played the game, I'm not all to worried about them.
articles.content: Now that the embargo date has passed, I can finally talk about the game that's been burrowing in my mind since I played it last week: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond. I flew out to New York to go hands-on wi… [+6092 chars]
